thread.title: A Body Language Expert Explains Donald Trump's Handshake Style
thread.title_full: A Body Language Expert Explains Donald Trump's Handshake Style

title: A Body Language Expert Explains Donald Trump's Handshake Style
text:
Sorry this article is not available in your chosen language. A Body Language Expert Explains Donald Trump's Handshake Style The Toronto Star | Alex Wong | Getty Images 
People tend to examine politicians under a microscope. The way they talk, walk, and dress are often conversation topics in the public and the media. For President Donald Trump, one gesture in particular has become a topic of interest: The way he shakes hands with other people. Believe it or not, a handshake can indicate a few things about someone's personality. So what might the President's handshake say about him? It's actually pretty interesting. Advertisement
